name: Kanken 準２級 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 核心
cards.meaning: core, heart (of the matter), point, crux, kernel

cards.question: 網羅
cards.meaning: encompassing, covering (exhaustively), including (all of), comprising, comprehending

cards.question: 閑散
cards.meaning: deserted (esp. store, market, town, streets), quiet, still, hushed, empty

cards.question: 座禅
cards.meaning: zazen (seated Zen meditation, usu. in a cross-legged position)

cards.question: 騰貴
cards.meaning: rise (in price or value), inflation, appreciation (economic)

cards.question: 吟味
cards.meaning: close examination, careful selection, testing, scrutiny

cards.question: 矢面
cards.meaning: firing line, position where one is subject to questioning, criticism, etc.

cards.question: 余韻
cards.meaning: reverberation, swelling (of a hymn), trailing note

cards.question: 全廃
cards.meaning: total abolition, full phase-out, total repeal

cards.question: 叔父
cards.meaning: uncle, uncle (younger than one's parent), uncle (one's father's younger brother)

cards.question: 総帥
cards.meaning: commander-in-chief, leader, head of a group of companies

cards.question: 亜流
cards.meaning: bad second, epigone, adherent, follower, imitator

cards.question: 溝
cards.meaning: ditch, drain, gutter, trench, 10^32, hundred nonillion

cards.question: 偏屈
cards.meaning: eccentric, warped, narrow-minded, perverse, obstinate, stubborn, bigoted

cards.question: 醜態
cards.meaning: disgraceful behavior, disgraceful behaviour, shameful sight

cards.question: 補佐
cards.meaning: aid, help, assistance, assistant, counselor, counsellor, adviser, advisor

cards.question: 抹消
cards.meaning: erasure, striking off, crossing out, cancellation, deletion

cards.question: 迅速
cards.meaning: quick, fast, rapid, swift, prompt, streamlined, expedited, expeditious

cards.question: 詐欺
cards.meaning: fraud, swindle, graft, cheating, trick, scam

cards.question: 禍根
cards.meaning: root of evil, source of evil

cards.question: 頑丈
cards.meaning: solid, firm, stout, burly, strong, sturdy

cards.question: 捜索
cards.meaning: search (esp. for someone or something missing), manhunt

cards.question: 苦渋
cards.meaning: bitterness, mortification, difficulty in understanding, distress, affliction

cards.question: 野暮
cards.meaning: boorish, unsophisticated, unrefined, uncouth, tasteless, insensitive, thoughtless, dumb

cards.question: 貝塚
cards.meaning: shell heap, shell mound, kitchen midden

cards.question: 誓う
cards.meaning: to swear, to vow, to take an oath, to pledge

cards.question: 更迭
cards.meaning: change (of personnel), reshuffle (e.g. of a cabinet), shake-up, dismissal (e.g. of a minister), replacement

cards.question: 拒む
cards.meaning: to refuse, to reject, to decline

cards.question: 中庸
cards.meaning: middle way, (golden) mean, moderation, middle path

cards.question: 廃刊
cards.meaning: ceasing to publish, discontinuance of publication

cards.question: 濃厚
cards.meaning: rich (in flavor, color, smell, etc.), thick, dense, strong

cards.question: 調える
cards.meaning: to put in order, to arrange, to tidy up, to straighten, to adjust, to fix

cards.question: 遮断
cards.meaning: isolation, cut off, blockade, quarantine, interception, deprivation

cards.question: 乙女
cards.meaning: little girl, maiden, young lady, female usually between 7 and 18 years old

cards.question: 履修
cards.meaning: taking a class, studying a subject, completing a course

cards.question: 体臭
cards.meaning: body odor, body odour, personal odor, personal odour, characteristic (of someone)

cards.question: 係累
cards.meaning: dependents, family members that one has to support

cards.question: 賜る
cards.meaning: to be given, to be granted, to be honored with, to be honoured with

cards.question: 傘
cards.meaning: umbrella, parasol, paper umbrella, bamboo-and-paper umbrella parasol

cards.question: 反物
cards.meaning: fabric, cloth, textiles, drapery, dry-goods, piece goods

cards.question: 被る
cards.meaning: to put on (one's head), to wear, to have on, to pull over (one's head), to crown (oneself), to suffer, to receive (kindness, rebuke, support), to sustain (damage)

cards.question: 棟上げ
cards.meaning: ridgepole-raising, setting up of the framework of a house

cards.question: 靴擦れ
cards.meaning: shoe sore, foot blister (caused by shoes)

cards.question: 漬かる
cards.meaning: to be submerged, to be soaked

cards.question: 川柳
cards.meaning: senryu, comic haiku, humorous seventeen-syllable poem, riverside willow (esp. rosegold pussy willow, Salix gracilistyla), riverside willow

cards.question: 漸次
cards.meaning: gradually, slowly, little by little, incrementally

cards.question: 大和
cards.meaning: Yamato, ancient province corresponding to modern-day Nara Prefecture

cards.question: 助太刀

cards.question: 侮辱

cards.question: 書斎

cards.question: 矯正

cards.question: 囲碁

cards.question: 殉職
cards.meaning: dying at one's post, being killed in the line of duty

cards.question: 表彰
cards.meaning: public acknowledgment, public acknowledgement, public recognition, commendation, awarding

cards.question: 甚だしい
cards.meaning: extreme, excessive, terrible, intense, severe, serious, tremendous, heavy (damage)

cards.question: 欠陥

cards.question: 若干
cards.meaning: some, few, a number of, a little (bit)

cards.question: 併用
cards.meaning: using together (jointly), used at the same time

cards.question: 褐色
cards.meaning: dark brown, colour of tanned skin, dark indigo (almost black)

cards.question: 山肌
cards.meaning: mountain's surface, bare surface of a mountain

cards.question: 畝
cards.meaning: ridge (in field), row of raised earth when planting crops, se (Japanese unit of area equal to 30 tsubo, ~99.174 m.sq.), mu (Chinese measure of land area, formerly ~600 m.sq., currently ~667 m.sq.)

cards.question: 天涯
cards.meaning: horizon, distant land, skyline, heavenly shores, remote region

cards.question: 犬猿

cards.question: 苦汁

cards.question: 平衡
cards.meaning: even scale, equilibrium, balance, equalization, equalisation

cards.question: 大尉
cards.meaning: captain (Army, U.S. Marine Corps, USAF), lieutenant (Navy), flight lieutenant (RAF, RAAF, RNZAF, etc.)

cards.question: 緒戦
cards.meaning: beginning of hostilities, beginning of competition

cards.question: 呉服
cards.meaning: cloth (for Japanese clothes), textile, drapery, dry goods, piece goods

cards.question: 愉快
cards.meaning: pleasant, delightful, enjoyable, joyful, cheerful, amusing, happy

cards.question: 仙人

cards.question: 主賓
cards.meaning: main guest, guest of honor, guest of honour

cards.question: 語弊
cards.meaning: faulty statement, misleading statement, misunderstanding caused by a misleading statement

cards.question: 披露
cards.meaning: announcement, presentation, demonstration, displaying, showing, introducing, exhibiting, unveiling, revealing, showcasing, performing, giving a rendition

cards.question: 捜索
cards.meaning: search (esp. for someone or something missing), manhunt

cards.question: 磨く
cards.meaning: to polish, to shine, to brush (e.g. teeth), to grind (e.g. lens)

cards.question: 亭主
cards.meaning: household head, master, host (e.g. of a tea gathering), innkeeper, owner (e.g. of an hotel)

cards.question: 猫舌
cards.meaning: dislike of very hot food or drink, inability to take hot food

cards.question: 顕在
cards.meaning: actual (as opposed to hidden or obscured), obvious, clear, manifest, explicit, overt, apparent, evident, actualized, actualised

cards.question: 予鈴
cards.meaning: bell signalling that work, class, etc. will formally begin shortly, first bell, warning bell

cards.question: 花瓶
cards.meaning: (flower) vase, vase used to hold flower offerings (often made of gilded copper)

cards.question: 融合
cards.meaning: agglutination, adhesion, fusion, combination, blending, uniting

cards.question: 挑発

cards.question: 山荘
cards.meaning: mountain villa, mountain retreat, mountain cottage

cards.question: 大雑把
cards.meaning: rough (as in not precise), broad, sketchy

cards.question: 付随
cards.meaning: being incident to, being accompanied by, being collateral with, being attached to

cards.question: 後戻り

cards.question: 朕
cards.meaning: We, Our, first person pronoun used by royalty

cards.question: 懲役
cards.meaning: penal servitude, imprisonment with hard labor (hard labour)

cards.question: 臭い
cards.meaning: stinking, smelly, odour, odor, scent, smell, stench

cards.question: 充満
cards.meaning: being filled with, being full of, permeation

cards.question: 亜流
cards.meaning: bad second, epigone, adherent, follower, imitator

cards.question: 晩酌

cards.question: 俊敏

cards.meaning: affiliated with, under jurisdiction of, under the umbrella

cards.question: 疎遠

cards.question: 中枢

cards.question: 薦める

cards.question: 懐古

cards.question: 銘菓

cards.question: 合併

cards.question: 据える

cards.question: 惰弱

cards.question: 侮る

cards.question: 生涯

cards.question: 駄作
